name: A Shopkeepers Predicament
description:
Did you ever stop to think what the NPCs in an MMO could be feeling like?  
What they could be thinking?  
Or how it could be to just...stand there?  

Get stuck in the routine of a Shopkeeper NPC, and influence his decisions in his interactions.

Watch out for those who watch you, and attempt to guide him towards a better fate...if you wish.

* Game made in 3 days for the 2020 Ludum Dare 47 Jam

Controls
  • Mouse Only 
  • Right-click to speed up the game (enabled after a quick while)
  • ESC for Pause Menu
Notes
  • The game does have an Ending.
  • The Itch.io version is the bugfixed version we did the day after the jam ended, as bugfixing is allowed. 
  • You can check the ChangeLog on the LDJam entry page, here.
  • Known Issue (very rare): In some computers, line breaks ("\n") may appear in some dialogs.
Cuts and Drops

A few planned things had to be cut to deliver in time.  
We intended the game to have French and Portuguese Translation. The Localization system is in place, we just didn't have the time to translate.
